item.title: Sen Amy Klobuchar says she's 'seriously considering' a gubernatorial bid
item.description: While Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz is abandoning his run for re-election, Sen. Amy Klobuchar told CNN she is "seriously considering" a run for governor.

item.title: Noem unloads on Walz over ICE raid criticism: ‘Really? You’re worried about taxpayer dollars?’
item.description: Political clash erupts as Noem defends ICE immigration enforcement while Walz calls federal operations "ridiculous" in misspelled social media post.

item.title: China bans military-use exports to key US ally as Taiwan tensions rise
item.description: China bans exports of dual-use goods to Japan, escalating tensions with key U.S. ally amid growing disputes over Taiwan and broader regional security ...

item.title: George Conway looks dramatically different in campaign announcement video
item.description: George Conway launched his congressional campaign with a dramatic new look, sparking social media buzz about his transformation and weight loss.

item.title: Left-wing Dems steer $1M to addiction group operating above Minneapolis Somali restaurant amid fraud fallout
item.description: Republican Sen. Joni Ernst targets alleged Minnesota federal funding amid fraud scandal, seeking to redirect $1 million from addiction recovery organi...
